name: Build A Train Puzzles
description:
Kids love trains. Kids also love puzzles. So why not give them train puzzles?!

Build A Train Puzzles is the perfect puzzle app for your kid. It's tons of puzzle-making fun, you'll never lose the pieces and it's easy to pick up!

With over a dozen puzzle scenes full of trains, boats, stations, and more, your kid will find lots to enjoy!

And with two different hint modes - you can show a piece by piece hint, a full puzzle hint or both - your kid can adjust the difficulty of each puzzle.

Features include:

• 15 fun-filled train puzzles
• Child-lock protection to hide print, email and external links


"A great game for train lovers."
- http://best10apps.com

Enjoy the app and please let email us at support@playtend.com if you have suggestions on how to make Build A Train Puzzles even better for your kid!
